title: Study at the University of Technology Nuremberg | UTN

text_sections.section_2: Join a new university – discover our Master’s degree programs!
text_sections.section_3: Why YOU should study at UTN:
text_sections.section_9: (i.e., several assignments or oral assessments such as oral conversations/exams, spread throughout the semester).
text_sections.section_10: Shape the university of the future with us!
text_sections.section_12: Actively shape the university as you engage in our unique interdisciplinary approach. Explore captivating fields such as computer vision, machine learning and robotics through specialized modules designed to prepare you for a successful career in industry and research. Immerse yourself in a dynamic and flexible environment where you can have a lasting impact on society.

text_sections.section_38: The most important facts at a glance
text_sections.section_40: We are offering two different online info formats on a regular basis: The Sessions give you a comprehensive overview of our degree programs, the application process as well as studying and learning at UTN.
text_sections.section_41: Have you decided to study? During our , our experts will be available to support you with your personal application and answer any further questions you may have.
text_sections.section_42: We look forward to helping you with your decision to study at UTN!
text_sections.section_43: Wednesday, , 1:00–2:00 p.m. (CET) Tuesday, , 1:00–2:00 p.m. (CEST) Friday, , 1:00–2:00 p.m. (CEST)
text_sections.section_45: Every Friday, 11:00 a.m.–12:00 p.m. (CET/CEST), from (Note: Germany switches from CET to CEST on the last Sunday in March.)
text_sections.section_47: “The first semester at UTN was a challenging, exciting and educational experience. I came to UTN to be part of an extraordinary project. After all, it is quite rare these days for new universities to be founded. The first semester contains important foundations for studying and later working life. The project work and assignments during the semester provide a lot of practical relevance that I missed at other universities. I’m looking forward to the tasks of the new semester!”
text_sections.section_49: “UTN follows an excellent teaching learning concept, which I feel is one of the best ways to learn that I have never experienced in my previous studies. In addition the small study groups enhance the learning as we get to interact more with the instructors and professors.”
